com.interpss.dist.adpter

Interface DistBusAdapter

  • All Superinterfaces:
    BusRef<DistBus>, com.hazelcast.nio.serialization.DataSerializable, org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject, NameTag, org.eclipse.emf.common.notify.Notifier
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    DistGenerator, DistIndMotor, DistMixedLoad, DistMotor, DistNonContribBus, DistRotatingMachine, DistSynMotor, DistUtility
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DistBusAdapterImpl, DistGeneratorImpl, DistIndMotorImpl, DistMixedLoadImpl, DistMotorImpl, DistNonContribBusImpl, DistRotatingMachineImpl, DistSynMotorImpl, DistUtilityImpl

    public interface DistBusAdapter
extends BusRef<DistBus>
    A representation of the model object 'Dist Bus Adapter'. A DistBusAdapter extends a DistBus object to a specific type behaviour, such as a Utility bus. A DistBusAdapter has a reference to a AcscBus. The setAcscBusData method sets the DistBus data to the AcscBus object for LF and SC analysis purpose.
    See Also:
    DistAdapterPackage.getDistBusAdapter()
